reviewText: This is an excellent true story of positive thinking and what it can do.  Everyone should view this.  I have it on DVD and I would like more copies to give away, but apparently not available right now.  I will keep checking back for the DVD or Bluray versions.

This is one of the finest motivational films of all time.  An excellent true account of Positive Thinking in action.  I have watched it many times and would like to buy more copies to give to friends.  I hope it becomes available again soon.
A most uplifting story for those who are using their power of the mind to heal themselves or for those who need or want a healing from within their own  selves,
